name: HiseeCloud
0:
”Alexa, show the camera name”
”Alexa, stop the camera name”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Hisee Cloud are designed to securely monitor your home or business from the Hisee Cloud App. With the skill Hisee Cloud, you can now interact with your Hiseeu cameras by voice.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Hisee Cloud account* and discover your Hisee cameres. find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to alexa: http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

When using the skill, you will need to create names for you devices, there are two ways to create theses names.

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show the camera name"
"Alexa, stop the camera name"
